Posts.EditableText: If you paste the errors you get here we can always help you. If you're missing a .dll or something you can always google for it specifically and download it, since it's usually only one or two needed.
Posts.HTML: If you paste the errors you get here we can always help you. If you're missing a .dll or something you can always google for it specifically and download it, since it's usually only one or two needed.

Posts.EditableText:
I had the same problem when I tried installing QDK for the first time, but Alex, or should I say Mr. Alex, praise his soul for making this editor, helped me out of it by diagnosing and resolving the problem as a virus protection program running during download.  If you think this might be the cause, close all programs and turn off virus protection programs when you dowload The Great QDK.

Witch
